Steps.StepString: Enter in the flag and copy each character into memory using the copy_char() function
Call check_flag() to receive boolean value based on validity of flag
Use Google Chrome's debugger to disassemble and add breakpoints
Perform side-channel attack by adding code snippets to increment counter whenever character is correct, reset counter whenever function is called
Brute force flag two characters at a time, starting with the first two
Compile C to WASM and copy code snippets to patch original binary using WasmFiddle
Write quick Node.js script to brute force the characters
